lead_paragraph: The body of a Tampa Bay minor league pitcher missing after his canoe capsized over the weekend was found yesterday in the New River near Independence, Va. The pitcher, Erik Walker, 23, was out on the river last Saturday with a female companion, who made it safely ashore after their canoe tipped in a swift stretch of rapids. Walker, of Clemmons, N.C., pitched in relief for the Class A Hudson Valley Renegades of the New York-Penn League.
